attributes.action: Why do we allow British Gas to increase its prices above the level of inflation
attributes.background: Consumers have now had to suffer two price increases this year from British Gas in addition to an increase last year. Surely this is British Gas taking advantage before the Energy price cap is imposed by the UK government at the end of the year?

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
